xml.data:
Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 5 Ganthagocchaka » 5.5 Ganthaganthasampayuttaduka » 5.5.7 Pañhāvāra » 5.5.7.1--4 Paccayānulomādi » 5.5.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Ganthagocchaka
Ganthaganthasampayuttaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānulomādi
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
116.
1880Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge nava, sampayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
1881(Arūpaṃyeva paccayaṃ, ekekassa tīṇi tīṇi kātabbā. Ārammaṇañca sahajātañca upanissayañca navasupi parivattetabbaṃ. Evaṃ pañhāvārepi sabbaṃ kātabbaṃ.)
1882Ganthaganthasampayuttadukaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
<< 5.5.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāraup5.6 Ganthavippayuttaganthaniyaduka >>
